String.string: Fragment of Hope
We must save Muhrak!
Striktryssir's Horn
[Sienna Canyon] Obtain Striktryssir's Horn at Barbtail Coulee.
Bring Striktryssir's Horn to Torsten, near the pyramid at Thunder Hold. [Sienna Canyon]
Go to the top of the pyramid.
The relic fragment grants you its power!
[Sienna Canyon] Go to the top of the pyramid on the right at Thunder Hold, then absorb the relic fragment's power.
Grigelt's Wrath
[Wyrmgorge] Hunt Grigelt in Deathgorge and gather the essence of its wrath.
Bring Grigelt's wrath to Torsten, near the altar in Deathgorge.
Go to the top of the altar.
Behold the relic fragment's power!
[Wyrmgorge] Go to Deathgorge and bring the relic fragment to the altar to release its power.
"I understand."
[Wyrmgorge] Go back to the altar and speak with Torsten again.
"Yes, absolutely!"
[Tor Exsul] Go to Torsten, near the teleportal in Blood Valley.
Jester's Villa
You sense the presence of Killian, God of Terror, nearby...
[Jester's Villa] Teleport in, eliminate Killian, and retrieve the last relic fragment.
[Jester's Villa] Eliminate Killian's pet, Snaharzim.
"I understand."
[Allemantheia HQ] Go back to Commander Fraya and tell her you have three of the four relic fragments.
"I'll find the blacksmith."
[Kaiator Command Center] Go back to Kaiator and tell Kaia that you have three relic fragments and a substitute for the fourth.
"Victory for Valkyon!"
[Kaiator Command Center] Ask Tamur if he has any information about the legendary blacksmith.
